trait.name: Charge
entries: If the alce moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its horns on the same turn, the target takes an extra 6 ({@damage 1d12}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The alce has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the alce can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The alce deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The alce has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The alce makes three attacks: one with its beak, one with its claws, and one with its horns.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Chimeric Body
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, knocked {@condition prone}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Flurry of Beaks (1/Turn)
entries: If the griffon misses with a beak attack, it can make another beak attack as part of the same action.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: The griffon has two extra reactions that can be used only for making opportunity attacks with its beak.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes four attacks: three with its beaks and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Screeching Chorus {@recharge}
entries: The griffon's three heads screech in unison, forcing each other creature within 15 feet of it that can hear it to make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) thunder damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage, and the target is {@condition deafened} until the end of the griffon's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition deafened}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The griffon is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The griffon has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The griffon is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks made to ascertain the griffon's intentions or sincerity are made with disadvantage.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The griffon's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Present Riddle (3/Day)
entries: The griffon telepathically poses a riddle to each creature of its choice that it can see within 60 feet of it. A creature that doesn't understand at least one language is immune to this effect. Each affected creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or become {@condition incapacitated} until the start of the griffon's next turn. The GM can choose to present a player with an actual riddle. If the player solves it, that character automatically succeeds on the saving throw. Otherwise, the character makes the saving throw as normal.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: The griffon makes one attack with its claws.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The griffon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The griffon casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

trait.name: Freezing Body
entries: A creature that touches the griffon or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The griffon has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes three attacks: one with its beak and two with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage.

action.name: Freezing Screech {@recharge 5}
entries: The griffon unleashes an ear-splitting cry infused with supernatural cold. Each creature of the griffon's choice within 30 feet must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The griffon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The griffon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fey Flare {@recharge 5}
entries: The griffon sheds radiant light in a 30-foot radius. Each hostile creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the griffon's next turn. Creatures that can't be {@condition blinded} automatically succeed.

monster.name: Druidic Griffon
languages: understands Druidic and Sylvan but can't speak

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The griffon is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}). It requires no material components to cast its spells. It has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Nature's Bond
entries: When the griffon is reduced to 0 hit points, plants within 30 feet of it rapidly overgrow the area, creating difficult terrain until cleared.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Verdant Screech {@recharge 5}
entries: The griffon releases a resonant cry that invigorates nature. Each creature of the griffon's choice within 20 feet must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by roots and vines (escape {@dc 14}). The plants wither after 1 minute or when the griffon dies.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The pseudogriffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The pseudogriffon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pseudogriffon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the pseudogriffon moves at least 10 feet straight toward a Small or smaller creature and then hits it with its claws on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the pseudogriffon can make one beak attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hypnotizing Gaze (1/Day)
entries: One creature the pseudogriffon can see within 20 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition charmed} for 1 hour or until the pseudogriffon or one of its allies does anything harmful to the target. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the target's speed is reduced to 0 and it is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the griffon can take the Hide action as a bonus action. If it makes an attack while hidden in dim light or darkness, the target takes an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage on a hit.

trait.name: Sunlight Weakness
entries: While in sunlight, the griffon has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The griffon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: The griffon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Shadow Form
entries: The griffon becomes a griffon-shaped, incorporeal cloud of wispy shadow until it dies or ends the effect as a bonus action. In this form it has a flying speed of 40 feet and can hover; it can enter and occupy another creature's space. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws; can pass through small holes, narrow openings, and even cracks (treats liquids as solid surfaces); moves silently; is {@condition invisible} while in areas of darkness (even to darkvision); can't fall and remains hovering even when {@condition stunned} or {@condition incapacitated}; can't manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying can't be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with; and the griffon can't attack.

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The griffon can see 120 feet into the Ethereal Plane when on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The griffon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Sap Life (1/Turn)
entries: When the griffon hits a creature with a melee attack, it can deal an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by the amount of necrotic damage dealt. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: The griffon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Spectral Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) force damage.

action.name: Spectral Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) force damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The griffon enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while in the Border Ethereal, but it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

trait.name: Aerial Stability
entries: The griffon is immune to any effect that would push, pull, or otherwise force it to move while flying.

trait.name: Cyclogenesis
entries: The griffon creates eddies along its path as it flies. When the griffon flies within 5 feet of a Medium or smaller creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, the creature is immune to this effect until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The griffon doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes three attacks: one with its beak and two with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Cyclone {@recharge 5}
entries: The griffon spins rapidly, creating a violent tornado centered on itself. Each creature within 30 feet must make a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) bludgeoning damage and is moved up to 30 feet in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and is moved up to 5 feet in a random direction but isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Electrified Body
entries: A creature that touches the griffon or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning damage.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The griffon doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the griffon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Silent Nature
entries: The griffon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes three attacks: one with its beak, one with its claws, and one with its tail.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) thunder damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d12 + 7}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The griffon fires a beam of crackling lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The griffon can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, it doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Heavy-Footed
entries: The griffon has advantage on ability checks and saving throws against any effect that would push it, pull it, or knock it {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The griffon has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its slam.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) bludgeoning damage (23 [{@dice 2d12 + 10}] if the target is an object or structure).

action.name: Emergent Eruption
entries: If the griffon starts its turn burrowed and within 10 feet of the surface, it can burst upward in an explosive upheaval of earth. Each creature within 10 feet must make a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw, taking 26 ({@damage 4d12}) bludgeoning damage and being knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half damage and no {@condition prone} on a success.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the griffon or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Piercing Heat
entries: Whenever the griffon deals fire damage, it can treat any 1 rolled on a damage die as a 2.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fire Spin {@recharge 4}
entries: The griffon flies up to 60 feet in a straight line, coiling its body into a tightly spinning streak of flame 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the griffon dies, it explodes in a burst of sparks and ash. Each creature within 30 feet must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. The explosion ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

trait.name: Elemental Nature
entries: The griffon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The griffon can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the griffon or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet takes 5 fire damage.

trait.name: Confer Fire Resistance
entries: The griffon can grant resistance to fire damage to anyone riding it.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the griffon's darkvision.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The griffon sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The griffon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes three attacks: one with its beak and two with its claws. Alternatively, it makes three Hurl Flame attacks.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Plane Shift (Recharges After a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The griffon and up to four creatures touching it are transported to a location of the griffon's choice on the Nine Hells, or to another plane of the griffon's choice on one of the Lower Planes if it is already there. An unwilling creature can make a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw to resist being transported.

trait.name: Blessed Weather
entries: The weather within 1 mile of the griffon clears supernaturally over time, as if by the {@spell control weather} spell, changing toward the "Clear," "Warm," and "Calm" stages respectively. Each stage change occurs over 1 minute. This trait doesn't affect weather influenced by magic.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The griffon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The griffon's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Radiant Absorption
entries: Whenever the griffon is subjected to radiant damage, it takes no damage and instead regains hit points equal to the radiant damage dealt.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) radiant damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Wave of Divinity {@recharge 5}
entries: The griffon emits a burst of divine energy in a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Up to four friendly creatures of its choice regain 18 ({@dice 3d8 + 5}) hit points and are freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness. Up to four hostile creatures of its choice must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or take 36 ({@damage 8d8}) radiant damage and become {@condition blinded} and {@condition deafened} until the start of the griffon's next turn.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The griffon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Invisible in Water
entries: The griffon is {@condition invisible} while fully immersed in water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hydro Wave {@recharge 5}
entries: The griffon expels a torrent of water in a 20-foot line that is 30 feet wide. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage and being knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much and not knocked {@condition prone} on a success.

vulnerable.note: from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The griffon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The griffon can't be affected or detected by spells of 3rd level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature, it is cursed. The next time the target takes a short or long rest, it is plagued by horrific dreams and gains no benefit from that rest. The curse then ends.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The griffon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 60 feet of it that can understand a language.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The griffon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stunning Screech (1/Day)
entries: The griffon emits a horrific screech. Each creature within 20 feet of it that can hear it and that isn't a demon must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the griffon's next turn.

reaction.name: Emit Spores {@recharge}
entries: When the griffon takes damage, it shakes loose a cloud of spores. Each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, a target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Emptying a vial of holy water on a target also ends the effect.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Kindler of Stars
entries: At the start of each of the griffon's turns and whenever it scores a critical hit, it conjures a Medium mote of light, which resembles a twinkling star, in an unoccupied space of its choice within 30 feet. The mote is intangible and sheds dim light in a 60-foot radius. A conjured mote lasts until the griffon is more than 1 mile away, dismisses it (no action required), or enters magical darkness. The griffon can have up to twelve motes at a time.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the griffon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The griffon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Universal Nature
entries: The griffon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes three attacks: one with its beak and two with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) force damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) force damage.

legendary.name: Create Star
entries: The griffon creates a mote, as per its Kindler of Stars trait.

legendary.name: Interstellar Stride
entries: The griffon teleports to an unoccupied space that is within the dim light shed by one of its motes.

legendary.name: Shooting Stars (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The griffon directs up to six motes to streak toward its foes. Each mote hits a creature the griffon can see within 120 feet, dealing 21 ({@damage 6d6}) force damage. Each target hit by at least one mote must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
